# Create Chat Room

# Description

Create chat room as a thread.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Title - The title of the new chat room. This field supports String type input.
* Message - Plain text content of the new message that is posted by the author of the chat room. This field supports String type input.









* Thread ID - The thread ID. Automatically generated output variable.
* Thread - Automatically generated output variable.
